sn1.28:1.2: even the aristocrats who rule the land,
sn1.28:2.1: Among those of such an avid nature,
sn1.28:2.2: flowing along the stream of lives,
sn1.28:2.3: who here has given up craving?
sn1.28:2.4: Who in the world is not avid?”
sn1.28:3.1: “Having given up their home, their child, their cattle,
sn1.28:3.2: and all that they love, they went forth.
sn1.28:3.3: Having given up desire and hate,
sn1.28:3.5: the perfected ones with defilements ended—
sn1.28:3.6: they in the world are not avid.”
